App Note 11: An overview of the electronic drive techniques for
intensity control and colour mixing of low voltage light sources such as
LEDs and LEPs.

front.note: Â© Copyright Artistic Licence (UK) Ltd May 2002
front.div:
There are a number of techniques that can be used for intensity control of
devices such as LEDs.
This white paper provides an overview of the available options and a brief
analysis of the relative benefits of each.
It should be understood that intensity control and colour mixing control are
terms that can be used interchangeably. Colour mixing simply involves the
intensity control of more than one colour.
